0:
mkdir -p /opt/scrutiny/config &&
cat << EOF > /opt/scrutiny/config/collector.yaml
---
# config piped from lifecycle.postStart script
version: 1
host:
  id: "$${NODE_NAME}"
api:
  endpoint: "$${COLLECTOR_API_ENDPOINT}"
EOF

/hr/k8s-at-home.com-charts-kah-common-ch.title: home-assistant helm release
/hr/k8s-at-home.com-charts-kah-common-ch.name: home-assistant
/hr/k8s-at-home.com-charts-kah-common-ch.doc:
Home Assistant

Home Assistant is a home automation platform that has many integrations. It can be used to control lights, fans, thermostats, cameras, and many other devicesn

0:
#!/bin/sh
npm install --save homebridge-dummy@latest
npm install --save homebridge-ws@latest
npm install --save homebridge-wemo@latest
npm install --save homebridge-plex-sensors@latest
npm install --save homebridge-wemoirrigation@latest
npm install --save homebridge-button-platform@latest
npm install --save homebridge-tuya-web@latest
npm install --save homebridge-z2m@latest
npm install --save homebridge-programmable-http-switch@latest
npm install --save homebridge-meross@latest
npm install --save homebridge-airvisual-2@latest
sabnzbd, sabnzbd.media, sabnzbd.default.svc, sabnzbd.default.svc.cluster, sabnzbd.default.svc.cluster.local, sabnzbd.lab.${SECRET_DOMAIN}
